revised_title: Investigating the Relationship between Fluorescence and Absorption Properties of Organic Molecules
tldr: The authors conducted experiments on various organic molecules in dilute solution to study their fluorescence and absorption properties. They tested the validity of the theoretical relation between radiative lifetime and absorption intensity and the mirror-image relation between fluorescence and absorption spectra. The results showed that the modified Strickler-Berg equation and the mirror-image relation were generally valid, with some exceptions due to changes in nuclear configuration.
